examples.example: 小朋友在博物馆里看到霸王龙的模型，兴奋得手舞足蹈。

translate.english: Children see the model of Tyrannosaurus Rex in the museum and are so excited that they dance excitedly.

examples.example: 霸王龙虽然曾经是陆地霸主，但也成为了我们探索远古世界的神奇钥匙。

translate.english: Although the Tyrannosaurus rex was once the overlord on land, it has also become a magical key for us to explore the ancient world.

examples.example: 考古学家们对霸王龙的研究越来越深入，为我们揭开了更多史前秘密。

translate.english: Archaeologists' research on Tyrannosaurus rex has become more and more in-depth, uncovering more prehistoric secrets for us.
